casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Gates, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Gates, 131 Ohio St.3d 372, 2012-Ohio-1221.]

(No. 2012-0030 Submitted March 21, 2012 Decided March 27, 2012.) Pamela J. Holder, Portage County Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Neil P. Agarwal, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for application of our decision in State v. Smith, 131 Ohio St.3d 297, 2012-Ohio-781, 964 N.E.2d 423.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
